General.Name: Hektas Ticaret TAS
General.Description: Hektas Ticaret T.A.S. produces, imports, and markets agricultural and veterinary pesticides and fertilizers in Turkey. Its crop protection products include fungicides, herbicides, insecticides, acaricides, biological insecticides, fumigants, nematicides and soil fumigants, plant growth regulators, winter struggle medicines and summer oils, and spread adhesives. The company also offers leaf fertilizers, organ minerals, drip irrigation, and other products; and tomato seeds. In addition, it provides antibacterial, vitamin and mineral, feed additive, anti-inflammatory, and anti-parasite health products for animal; poultry health products; and pet care products and pet foods. Hektas Ticaret T.A.S. was founded in 1956 and is headquartered in Gebze, Turkey.
General.Address: Gebze Organize Sanayi BOelgesi, Gebze, Turkey, 41400
